reviews.review: This game is fun with friends as a survivor in a discord call and fun solo as a killer for when you need to take your anger out at something. The only cavot to that is that the community can lead to some "fun words" after games if you do not play a very specific way. I recommend this game if you have friends to play it with, and even if you don't.
It's fun to play with people you know. Can be kinda of rough playing with randos.
Jogo divertido, bom para passar o tempo já que são partidas e nada contínuo.

a love letter to fans of horror (especially the slasher genre)

que puedo decir de este juego? bueno, ya lo llevo jugando como 1 mes, y lo primero que vi y que fue lo que mas medio bronca y casi rompo mi pc fue que todos los killers te persiguen hasta que te tiran y una ves hecho eso te cuelgan y ahi empieza lo que medio bronca y es que te re CAMPEAN HASTA LA MUERTE Y SI TE DESCUELGAN APENAS LO HACEN PUES TE PERSIGUE ENSEGUIDA SIN PERDER TIEMPO Y HAGAS LO QUE HAGAS TE TERMINA TIRANDO AL SUELO, TE VUELVE A COLGAR Y DEVUELTA A CAMPEAR Y SI PASA LO MISMO ENSEGUIDA OTRA VES TE PERSIGUE SIN PERDER TIEMPO ALGUNO Y TE TIRA AL SUELO NUEVAMENTE YA COLGADO OTRA VES SOLO ESPERA HASTA QUE TE MUERAS Y DEPUES MUERTO HACE LO  MISMO CON LOS DEMAS JUGADORES

LA VERDAD SI PUEDEN NO COMPREN ESTE JUEGO, TE DA UNA RE BRONCA POR QUE LOS KILLERS PARECEN PIBITOS DE 13 AÑOS QUE JUEGAN AL FORTNITE CON SU CAMPEO Y TUNELEAN A MAS NO PODER, SON RE CAGONES, Y SI LOS PUTOS DESARROLLADORES VEN ESTE MENSAJE PUES ARREGLEN ESO O PERDERAN MUCHA GENTE QUE JUEGA SUS JUEGOS

C'est un bon jeux dommage que certains joueur soit "toxique" et du coup ruine le fun du jeux car en vrai tu peux avoir du fun sur ce jeux parfois tu tombe avec des gens qui joue fair play c'est agréable mais bien trop rare. de plus ce qui est aussi problématique est que le jeux permet c'est comportement (camp et face camp, tunnel "pour les tueur" et troll de la part des survivant "clique clique lampe et s'amuser a s'accroupir devant une palettes abaisser" comme des tueurs). De plus le jeux est pas compétitif ce que certains joueur ne comprenne pas alors que d'autre si (si le tueur tues les 4 survivants en jouant fair ce qui arrive parfois bah félicitation et si a l'inverse il a tué peu ou pas de survivant ce qui arrive aussi bah c'est pas grave tu feras mieux la prochaine partie "par contre si il tue peu car il a tunnel et camp bah la aussi c'est la faute du tueur pas des survivant faut abuser non plus).
 Sinon le jeux essaye d'équilibrer les parties entre les tueurs et les survivant ce qui est positif même si un certains avantage est donner au tueur car certaines capacité des survivant ont été fortement diminué dans l'avantage qu'elle offrait (certaines avec raison comme le cercle de soin qui était trop puissant) et celle des tueur ont été améliorer (certaines avec raison) ce qui oblige les survivant a jouer des objets ou des capacités pour pas tomber trop vite.
Sinon autre point positif le jeux essaye comme il peut d'ajouter de nouvelles choses ce qui est un bon point sa on va se mentir c'est même très très sympa il arrive de nouveaux tueurs, de nouveaux survivants, de nouvelles capacités et de nouvelles cartes ce qui est très attrayant.
Sinon le jeu est assez jolie graphiquement sur pc un peu moins sur console les différentes cartes sont sympa sauf hadonfield qui a été refaites et est devenus pas terrible du tout y a rien pour les survivant.
Sinon le mode de parties privée qui permet de jouer entre amis est sympa et peux même donner des situation a mourir de rire.
AMZING GAME

Dead by Daylight ist eine gute Ablenkung aus seinem eigenen Horror / Psycho Spiel.

Ohne Freunde oder Bekannte wird es jedoch immer der Reinste Horror bleiben. Bei manchen Teammates denkst du dir einfach warum diese kein Ego Shooter spielen, weil diese eh nur auf sich selber Acht geben: Locken extra den Killer zu dir, heilen dich nicht, & rennen raus sobald das Tor offen ist.

Entweder ein Spiel was dir sehr viele lustige Stunden oder die pure Verzweiflung bringt. Es macht mir aber trotzdem Spaß und werde es daher auch weiter empfehlen. Trotzdem benötigt man manchmal eine "dicke Haut", denn sowohl Survivor als auch Killer, könnten sehr anstrengend sein.

Und bitte fixt die Taschenlampe.. Taschenlampen Spieler wissen was ich meine...

Gra Dead By Daylight zaskakuje graczy (sam w tym gronie byłem i nadal jestem i sobie chwalę)
-Mapy
Mapy bardzo rozbudowanie nie ma żadnych spadków FPS w grze nawet w menu gry
-Grafika
Bardzo zadowalająca grafika ale zawsze może być lepsza (kiedyś może zrobią grafikę podobną do GTA 5) pomarzyć zawsze sobie można ale poza tym gra chodzi bardzo płynne na full ustawieniach żadnych lagów ani spadków FPS
-Muzyka
Najlepsza muzyka jest przy killerach wtedy czuję się klimat prawdziwego horroru
-Rozgrywka
Można łatwo porobić każdego killera na inteligencję (działa to w dwa strony)
Przyjemne się też gra solo lub z ekipa
Killerzy trudniejsi są łatwiejsi w obsłudze niż ci łatwi (wiem to po sobie)
Niektóre perki są praktyczne bezużyteczne bo może się trafić killer z lepszymi perkami od ciebie
-Aktualizacje
Twórcy ciągle aktualizują grę i dają nam różne skiny do postaci, eventy, misje, nagrody, nowych morderców i survivorów jak się kupi przepustkę lub DLC do gry
-Minusy
Gracze którzy wychodzą z meczu gdy killer niesie ich na hak, to dla mnie nie są gracze tylko lamusy którzy psują innym rozgrywkę oraz szansę na dobrą wygraną
Takich graczy powinno się karać baniem na grę (wtedy by się nauczyli grania w teamie)

monstro

If you have ever been the victim of abuse and struggle with PTSD from it, do not play this game.  You will frequently find yourself in situations that cause you to feel like you are being abused and you won't recognize why you feel that way playing a stupid game until you're already addicted.  In all the decades I've been gaming, this game is the only one that's ever made me feel this way.

If you're mentally healthy and don't mind a huge grind and a somewhat flawed game, have at it.  This game is really fun most of the time.

Absolute trash game. Runs awful, plays awful and has been run into the ground. No fun at all, just pure frustration every single match, every pallet and every flashlight ! As someone who's played it since 2007 i'm now done for good.

With current mmr and meta this game is painful to play no matter what side you're on.
It's very plainly not fun. If you like suffering, never really feeling like you achieved anything even if you win and constant grinds with a toxic playerbase...
Then play league of legends because honestly, even that is less frustrating. And boy, league is also a game that I do not recommend. So hey, if you hate yourself, league and dbd, two games you'll love.

A game who needs a nasa pc to just not lag on low? Were the games are either a stomp or a total failure? That's the game for you! Then this game is for  you! Enjoy a total shitfest of a game, for only 170 euros on sale!

Games a perfect love hate relationship
I love being survivor but being the killer is like death by 1000 cuts
LISTEN DEV TEAM I KNOW YOUR FUCKING SLOW, BUT IF YOU MAKE THE KILLERS SO UNPLAYABLE AND MAKE THE MATCHMAKING SO UNBALANCED THAT THEY ARE UNENJOYABLE THEN THE POINT OF YOUR GAME IS LOST AND IT WILL DIE VERY QUICKLY
It’s unbelievable how unbalanced this game is and favors survivors. Having 3 to 4 people escape just shouldn’t be the norm, have any of the developers ever watched a horror movie?

If it was a balanced battleground fine, but it’s like everything is stacked against the killer.

3 hooks to kill a player, and that’s not including decisive strike which could have you chasing for a 3rd time.


* generators that are well spaced that wouldn’t taking players out early, forget about it, most survivors will spread out and gen rush.

* generators are too quick to fix, and on top of that survivors have addons which make it even faster.

* Pallets which penalize the killer, fine have pallets but do they have to stun, making the killer likely to lose sight of the target because of the animation.

* ridiculous loops

* Better Auras for survivors to ensure that killer is far away and yo continue to work on the gens.

* 2 shots to take down a survivor, something that is disgustingly exploited to block the killer from downing a hurt survivor, or to allow to unhook a survivor.

* Survivors for some reason can take another shot when they’re unhooked, really?

* Survivors being able to heal each other with their magical hands, come on really? Why not make it that they need to find med kits to do that?

* forgot to also mention sabotage, so if you have 2 survivors carrying around a tool box, they can sabotage a total of 6 hooks, are you ****ing kidding me?

I love this game, but it’s ridiculous just how unbalanced it is. If you’ve played F13 which is a clunky mess, atleast they’ve got one thing right, escape is so damn hard and you’ll get 1 or 2 that usually make it out if any. What’s worse is when you go up to the gate in the end, you have 3 to 4 ****bags all t-bagging you, 2 of who probably didn’t do jack for most of the game.

If you plan to play solo go play one of the other many 4 vs 1 out there until they fix matchmaking to actually account for what people do in a match. The match making only cares about escaping as survivor or killing as killer so if you want bad teammates who just hide and dont know how to actually play the game you are going to not enjoy yourself very much in this. Until they actually take into account other things that are done during the match ie: gens , totems , running the killer or fast downing , hooking different survivors after another this game wont improve at all. Save your money or atleast go get it for a discount somewhere. It has lost so many active users if it doesnt change itll be dead within a year. The grind if you are new to this game will take years if you want everything so if you want to punish yourself this is for you but if not go find another one this isnt getting better at all.

This game is fantastic, I’m completely aware of the toxicity and bugs but overall one of my favourite games in my library. I enjoy the constant updates and fresh content every few months. I do wish character customisation wasn’t so expensive or cost irl money as iridescent shards are hard to get a lot of. Game is highly entertaining and scenic especially with friends. Love it !!

Being new to this game, I have experienced my fair share of BS. But in retrospect, it's not really all that bad. You get to play as iconic killers from famous horror franchises, along with survivors that come with them. It will take awhile getting used to the game play, but the more you play, the better you'll learn how to dodge and weave killer attacks if playing as a survivor. It's really all about trail and error.

DBD in the beginning was a hot mess. The p2p server connection and the lag made it darn near unplayable. However, over the past few years, as it's gained a larger following, its definitely gotten better. If you can get past the toxic post game chat (the majority of the time) and the tunneling killers, and yes, ever toxic teabagging survivors, the game can be a lot of fun. Always changing, always improving, always shaking things up with new killers/perks/survivors, I def recommend giving it a go.

游戏整体来说还不错，画风与氛围感都打造得很好，游戏初期竞技游戏性很强，无论是玩屠夫还是逃生者都很考验策略，只可惜游戏运营越来越将游戏娱乐化，加入了很多过于背离游戏初始设定的东西......
  在游戏中还是能找到很多乐趣，但是已不像从前那样有趣，夸张的技能与道具只会让人感到越玩越疲乏了。
